name: The Necromancer Arises
description:
The Necromancer Arises is a 2D hand-drawn visual novel with top-notch artwork where modern-day Earth that has been changed by the emergence of portals leading to dungeons filled with monsters and treasures. Hunters, classified into ranks based on their power level, are people with the ability to enter these dungeons and fight the monsters.

The story follows a powerless protagonist who, one day, discovers a mysterious book in his front yard.
Little did he know, this book would awaken his latent hunter skills, turning him into a force to be reckoned with.
After gaining necromantic powers and becoming a Hunter, he joins the prestigious Hunter’s Academy.

This game features lots and lots of impregnation and breeding dirty talk, so if that's your thing you'll love it.

This is a LINEAR nukige game, and it features no choices or alternative endings. Sex comes first, plot comes last.
